QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, rsm_req_requisitions.id odf_pk, rsm_req_requisitions.STATUS_CODE as status_code, NVL(REQUIREMENTS.REQUIREMENT_NAME,REQUIREMENTS_RES.FULL_NAME) as requirement_name, project_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, project_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, rsm_req_requisitions.DESCRIPTION as description, INVESTMENTS.NAME as project_name, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_CURVE as request_curve, project_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as last_updated_by, rsm_req_requisitions.BOOK_MANAGER_ID as book_manager_id, rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_ID as project_id, RSM_REQ_REQUISITIONS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_FINISH as request_finish, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_START as request_start, REQUIREMENTS.PRRESOURCEID as resourceid, rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_TYPE as object_type, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUISITION_CODE as requisition_code, INVESTMENTS.CODE as project_unique_name, rsm_req_requisitions.DUE_DATE as due_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUIREMENT_ID as requirement_id, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUESTED_BY as requested_by, rsm_req_requisitions.IS_REPLACE as is_replace, rsm_req_requisitions.PRIORITY_CODE as priority_code, rsm_req_requisitions.NAME as name, REQUIREMENTS_RES.FULL_NAME as requested_rsc_name, REQUIREMENTS.PRRESOURCEID as resource_id, UPDATED.ID as updated_by_id, RSM_REQ_REQUISITIONS.OBJECT_ID as project_link_id, rsm_req_requisitions.IS_UNBOOK as is_unbook, RSM_REQ_REQUISITIONS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, CREATED.ID as created_by_id, odf_ca_requisition.partition_code as partition_code, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_AVGRATE as request_avgrate, project_id.entity as odf_entity_code from rsm_req_requisitions rsm_req_requisitions JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=rsm_req_requisitions.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=rsm_req_requisitions.last_updated_by JOIN inv_investments INVESTMENTS ON INVESTMENTS.id=rsm_req_requisitions.object_id JOIN prteam REQUIREMENTS ON REQUIREMENTS.prid=rsm_req_requisitions.requirement_id JOIN srm_resources REQUIREMENTS_RES ON REQUIREMENTS_RES.id=REQUIREMENTS.prresourceid JOIN odf_ca_requisition odf_ca_requisition ON odf_ca_requisition.id=rsm_req_requisitions.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_investments.id odf_pk, inv_investments.entity_code as entity, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_end as odf_period_end from inv_investments inv_investments JOIN pac_mnt_projects PAC_MNT_PROJECTS ON PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.id=inv_investments.id JOIN odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv ON odf_ca_inv.id=inv_investments.id join odf_object_instance_mapping oim1 on inv_investments.id = oim1.primary_object_instance_id and oim1.primary_object_instance_code='project' join fin_financials fin_financials on oim1.secondary_object_instance_id = fin_financials.id and oim1.secondary_object_instance_code='financials' JOIN odf_ca_financials odf_ca_financials ON odf_ca_financials.id=FIN_FINANCIALS.id where 1 = 1 ) project_id ON project_id.odf_pk=rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_ID where 1 = 1 and rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_TYPE = 'SRM_PROJECTS'
